events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like a full refund. The product is not what I expected and I want to return it as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund process.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your order and get a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unopened and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 453210987. The package is unopened and in perfect condition, I just want to exchange or get my money back.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately once you ship the item back using our prepaid return label, which I will send you shortly.
That sounds good, thanks for the quick response and help in resolving this issue!
We have sent the prepaid return shipping label to your email. Once we receive the return, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that your refund has been processed after we received your returned package. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We are closing this case as the refund process is complete. Thank you for your patience and please contact us again anytime if needed.
